code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../utils/AuthContext';import codepinklogowhite from'../images/codepinklogowhite.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{isAuthenticated,username,logout}=useAuth();const handleLogout=()=>{logout();navigate('/login');};useEffect(()=>{console.log("Authentication State Updated: isAuthenticated=".concat(isAuthenticated,", username=").concat(username));},[isAuthenticated,username]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"bg-beige-800 p-4 shadow-md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:codepinklogowhite,alt:"Code Pink Logo",className:"mx-auto h-8"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"flex space-x-4",children:isAuthenticated?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",className:"text-black hover:text-blue-300",children:["Hi ",username]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"text-black hover:text-blue-300",children:"Logout"})})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",className:"text-black hover:text-blue-300",children:"Sign Up"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"text-black hover:text-blue-300",children:"Login"})})]})})]})});};export default Navbar;
